purpose: Facilitates the creation and orchestration of multimodal AI agents capable of collaboration and reflection.
principle: Leverages LangChain and LLMs to enable complex workflows and interactions between multiple AI agents.
reusability: Designed for composability with a focus on multi-agent systems, offers modular components for building and integrating agents.
limitations: Being in alpha, it may have incomplete features, limited documentation, and potential stability issues.
name: agentica
description: Agentica: Effortlessly Build Intelligent, Reflective, and Collaborative Multimodal AI Agents! 轻松构建智能、具备反思能力、可协作的多模态AI Agent。
highlight: Effortlessly build intelligent, reflective, and collaborative multimodal AI agents.
